My thought on this is employee have to clear with employer in Induction process, when HR explain about policies then they will clear that employee have to serve notice period (30 Days, 60 Days, 90 Days) if they wants to leave. and this notice period will be applicable for both parties, If company wants to relieve employee without mistake not because of poor work performance then company have to give them same notice duration. And if employee misbehave in office then employer can fire or terminate employee on immediate basis

The TextField wrapper component is a complete form control including a label, input, and help text. It comes with three variants: outlined (default), filled, and standard.
